DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
Orb: Draw 1 card at the start of your turn. When #yEvoked, draw 2 cards.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy at the end of your turn.
Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the least HP. Damage is increased by the number of orbs that are #yChanneled. When #yEvoked, gain an Orb slot.
Orb: Rolls #yDice. When #yEvoked, applies #yJinx to ALL enemies.
Jinxed enemies lose HP whenever they receive a debuff.
Orb: Apply #yIgnite to ALL enemies. Gain #yFocus when evoked.
